name: 葉奕良
objective: 先修課程：負責教授同意。本課程為自動控制延伸課程。利用自動控制課程所學工具及原理，設計與分析系統及控制器；並以機電系統為例，介紹系統建模(modeling)與數位控制基本觀念。為使學生明白控制實務應用常見情形，並建立控制需求及設計基礎。
schedule:
Week 1. preparation week
Week 2. introduction
Week 3. system dynamics and modeling I
Week 4. system dynamics and modeling II
Week 5. system dynamics and modeling III
Week 6. discretization I
Week 7. discretization II
Week 8. discretization III
Week 9. 期中考
Week 10.filtering and measurement I
Week 11.filtering and measurement II
Week 12.disturbances and uncertainties I
Week 13.disturbances and uncertainties II
Week 14.controller design I
Week 15.controller design II
Week 16.controller design III
Week 17.introduction to modern control
Week 18.期末考
scorePolicy:
作業    30%
期中考 30%
期末考 40%
